qas.question: Which district is OU Medicine campus located in?
Which institution houses the Level-One trauma center?
Approximately how many people work in OU Health Sciences Center?

context: The University of Oklahoma has several institutions of higher learning in the city and metropolitan area, with <a1_0>OU Medicine<a1_0/> and the University of Oklahoma Health Sciences Center campuses located east of downtown in the <a0_0>Oklahoma Health Center district<a0_0/>, and the main campus located to the south in the suburb of Norman. The OU Medicine hosting the state's only Level-One trauma center. OU Health Sciences Center is one of the nation's largest independent medical centers, employing more than <a2_0>12,000<a2_0/> people. OU is one of only four major universities in the nation to operate six medical schools.[clarification needed]
